Comments_List: I advanced my ability to create a cohesive argument and use quote and supporting evidence in an effective way. I got a lot better at making my argument clear and using relevant information to back it up.
A general understanding of the purpose of museums and monuments through the ages.
I learned how to structure and develop an essay. I worked a lot on narrowing the focus of my essays.
I learned how to write and analyze articles better
Overall this course was very good as I was exposed to new ideas, became a much better writer, and got one-on-one help with the professor.
The instructor is amazing, however, the material is lacking at times.

I really liked the idea of turning in rough drafts of our essays because then we were able to actually go through and make the changes to make our essays better. I think the essays could have been introduced sooner just to give us a little more time for them.
I like the course. It couldnt have been better
Yes, I believe this course is important to really refine a student's writing abilities and to teach a student a good approach to writing argumentative essays.

I would definitely recommend this course. Professor Wild is very responsive and very engaged, so you will never feel lost with any assignment. The readings are not too complicated to read and the essays are interesting to write.
Of course, it is one of the best English 114 sections.

I thought this was a great way to work on your writing with the revision period on the essays. Also, it's really cool how they have so many different topics so you can find one that's interesting to you.
Yes. It taught me how to be a better writer.
